Indian Economy.title: India’s household savings dipped to 5-year low, liabilities surged to 5-year high, says FinMin data

Indian Economy.title: Tariff-blow cushion: A tourism boom could offset India’s export adversity
Indian Economy.summary: This sector offers India much scope to make good any losses from weak exports on account of higher tariffs. Its use as a shock absorber in the face of Trump’s trade policy is within our control, but demands rapid and resolute action.

Stock Market.summary: The selling pressure was particularly pronounced in heavyweight stocks, with top constituents by weightage including HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, Reliance Industries and Infosys witnessing strong selling

Startups & Funding.summary: Hyderabad-based Jeh Aerospace raises $11M led by Elevation Capital to expand software-driven aerospace manufacturing and build mega factories for global clients.

Startups & Funding.summary: Atom Alloys has developed a patented, sensor-less material system that prevents explosions in fuel storage across LPG tanks, diesel tankers, petrol reservoirs, and renewable fuel containers

Startups & Funding.summary: SoftBank Group Corp. is building up stakes in Nvidia Corp. and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., the latest reflection of Masayoshi Son’s focus on the tools and hardware underpinning artificial intelligence.

Banking & Finance.title: Sports buff, composed banking veteran Rajiv Anand is IndusInd Bank’s new CEO
Banking & Finance.summary: Considering Anand for IndusInd’s top job a natural choice for the regulator, as he passes “fit and proper criteria”, has over 35 years of banking experience across segments, and is aged only 59 years.

Banking & Finance.summary: RBI eliminates approval for AD banks to open SRVAs, promoting INR invoicing amid US trade pressure, speeding up process.

Banking & Finance.title: Is credit demand really slowing? RBI’s liquidity push tells a different story
Banking & Finance.summary: Despite a drop in bank credit growth, overall credit demand remains steady, shifting toward capital markets and NBFCs as RBI’s liquidity transmission plays out across channels.

Technology Sector.title: Manuscript of Satya Pal Malik’s tell-all book on J&K was hidden by him. Will it see the light of day?
Technology Sector.summary: Before he was hospitalised, Malik revealed that, as a precaution, he had moved the unfinished manuscript to an undisclosed location. After his death, one of his trusted aides told 'The Indian Express' that the book was “almost done” but not yet finished.

Technology Sector.summary: Saiyaara has entered the Rs 500 crore club in just 18 days, becoming the first-ever Mohit Suri film to achieve this milestone.
